# GitHub Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
This is "I'm not human captcha" - a recaptcha system designed specifically for AI agents. The project aims to distinguish between human users and AI agents through specialized captcha mechanisms.

## Project Goals
- Create a captcha system that can effectively identify and challenge AI agents
- Provide a recaptcha solution tailored for the modern AI landscape
- Maintain simplicity and ease of integration

## Coding Standards
- Keep code clean and well-documented
- Follow standard best practices for the language/framework being used
- Ensure security is a top priority given the nature of the project
- Write self-explanatory code with meaningful variable and function names

## Documentation
- Update the README.md when adding significant features
- Document all public APIs and interfaces
- Include examples for usage when applicable

## Testing
- Write tests for new features and functionality
- Ensure all tests pass before submitting changes
- Test against various AI agent scenarios when relevant

## Security Considerations
- This project deals with authentication and verification mechanisms
- Always consider potential security vulnerabilities
- Follow security best practices for captcha systems
- Be mindful of privacy concerns when handling user interactions

## Contributing
- Make small, focused changes
- Provide clear commit messages
- Keep the project structure organized and maintainable
